synopsis.text: When Ash Ketchum oversleeps on his 10th birthday, he's left with an uncooperative Pikachu instead of his first-choice Pokémon. Despite their rocky start, the pair form an unbreakable bond and embark on a thrilling quest to find the Legendary Pokémon Ho-Oh, guided by the Rainbow Wing it leaves behind. Along the way, they encounter familiar faces, new trainers like Verity and Sorrel, and a mysterious Mythical Pokémon named Marshadow. Ash and Pikachu face off against powerful trainers, including the arrogant Cross, in epic Pokémon battles. Will their journey lead them to Ho-Oh, or will their adventure end prematurely at the hands of a formidable foe? Join Ash and Pikachu as they embark on the beginning of one of popular culture's most cherished friendships in Pokémon the Movie: I Choose You!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
